az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended)

container_port.description: Container port the Go API listens on

db_multi_az.description: Whether to enable Multi-AZ for RDS

db_password_secret_name.description: Secrets Manager secret name that stores the DB password (string).

db_skip_final_snapshot.description: Skip final snapshot on destroy (dev convenience)

health_check_path.description: ALB target group health check path
